com.here.msdkui.guidance.base

Class BaseGuidancePresenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.msdkui.guidance.base.BaseGuidancePresenter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GuidanceEstimatedArrivalViewPresenter, GuidanceManeuverPresenter, GuidanceNextManeuverPresenter, GuidanceSpeedPresenter, GuidanceStreetLabelPresenter

    public class BaseGuidancePresenter
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for guidance presenters.

    This class interacts with NavigationManager and PositioningManager to support easier handling of guidance events.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected BaseGuidancePresenter(com.here.android.mpa.guidance.NavigationManager navigationManager, com.here.android.mpa.routing.Route route)
      Constructs a new instance using a NavigationManager instance and a route to follow during guidance.

      • handleNewInstructionEvent

        protected void handleNewInstructionEvent()
        Notifies on new instruction events generated by NavigationManager. Subclasses may override this method if they are interested in the events forwarded by NavigationManager.NewInstructionEventListener.
